en: We need to supply clean water to the village.

tr: Kirliliği azaltmak için temiz enerji sağlanmalı.
en: Clean energy must be supplied to reduce pollution.
He supplies books to several libraries in the city.

tr: İstikrarlı bir gıda tedariki ulusal güvenlik için hayati önemdedir.
en: A stable food supply is crucial for national security.
I can’t bear this pain any longer.
It's hard to bear the heat in the summer.
You must bear the consequences of your actions.
She bore the pain without complaining.

tr: Hükümet yeni politikayı gelecek ay uygulayacak.
en: The government will implement the new policy next month.
We need to implement these changes immediately.
The manager implemented the strategy step by step.
It took months to implement the new system.

tr: Planı etkili bir şekilde hayata geçiremediler.
en: They failed to implement the plan effectively.
Fear can hinder your progress.
Too many rules can hinder creativity.
Financial problems may hinder development.
Negative thinking can hinder decision-making.
Lack of confidence can hinder success.
We need to determine the cause of the problem.
The test will determine your English level.

tr: Yeni bir hayata başlamaya karar verdi.
en: She determined to start a new life.

tr: Toplantı için en uygun zamanı belirleyelim.
en: Let’s determine the best time for the meeting.
Age doesn’t determine your abilities.
